p.d: Watercolours and stuffed cabbage on the banks of the Garonne In Tonneins, in the Lot-et-Garonne, France meets Christian, a watercolourist who offers "exploration and painting" walks in his department. He presents his friend St√©phane, a cook in Monheurt, who will be preparing the traditional dish of cabbage stuffed with pork and apples. A moment captured by Christian's paintbrush. Presented by: France Oberkampf.
